DatasetDescription.Label: Dataset Description
DatasetDescription.Value: Dataset of Irish Hospital Patient Records for AI Model Development, 2019-2023

DatasetLicense.Label: Dataset License
DatasetLicense.Description: License under which the data is provided

PurposeOfDataCollection.Label: Purpose of Data Collection
PurposeOfDataCollection.Description: The intended purpose of data collection

Beneficiaries.Label: Beneficiaries
Beneficiaries.Description: Identifies the groups or individuals who will benefit from the use of the data

BenefitsOfDataUse.Label: Benefits of Data Use
BenefitsOfDataUse.Description: Specifies the anticipated benefits of using the data
BenefitsOfDataUse.Value: Improved patient outcomes through enhanced diagnostic accuracy

EthicalApproval.Label: Ethical Approval
EthicalApproval.Description: Indicates whether the use of the data has received ethical approval from relevant bodies

CollectionPeriod.Label: Collection Period
CollectionPeriod.Description: The period during which the data was collected

DataValidityEndDate.Label: Data Validity End Date
DataValidityEndDate.Description: The date until which the dataset is valid

ValidDuration.Label: Valid Duration
ValidDuration.Description: Duration for which the dataset is valid

GenderDistribution.Label: Gender Distribution
GenderDistribution.Description: Percentage distribution of genders in the dataset

LikelihoodOfGenderBias.Label: Likelihood of Gender Bias
LikelihoodOfGenderBias.Description: Likelihood of bias due to gender distribution

LikelihoodOfGeographicalBias.Label: Likelihood of Geographical Bias
LikelihoodOfGeographicalBias.Description: Likelihood of bias due to geographic distribution

LikelihoodOfAgeBias.Label: Likelihood of Age Bias
LikelihoodOfAgeBias.Description: Likelihood of bias due to age distribution

LikelihoodOfSocioeconomicBias.Label: Likelihood of Socioeconomic Bias
LikelihoodOfSocioeconomicBias.Description: Likelihood of bias due to socioeconomic distribution

LikelihoodOfRacialBias.Label: Likelihood of Racial Bias
LikelihoodOfRacialBias.Description: Likelihood of bias due to ethnic distribution

IncompletionOfData.Label: Incompletion of Data
IncompletionOfData.Description: Indicates whether the dataset is incomplete

MissingDataElements.Label: Missing Data Elements
MissingDataElements.Description: Specifies the particular elements or types of data that are missing from the dataset

AppliedBiasMitigationMethods.Label: Applied Bias Mitigation Methods
AppliedBiasMitigationMethods.Description: Methods used to mitigate bias in the dataset

PresenceOfPersonalData.Label: Presence of Personal Data
PresenceOfPersonalData.Description: Indicates if personal data is present

JustificationForNoConsent.Label: Justification for No Consent
JustificationForNoConsent.Description: Specifies the justification and methods for using data in cases where consent was not obtained
JustificationForNoConsent.Value: Data anonymized and used for public health research under ethical guidelines

AccessRestrictions.Label: Access Restrictions
AccessRestrictions.Description: Level of access an entity will have to the data

ProhibitiveRestrictions.Label: Prohibitive Restrictions
ProhibitiveRestrictions.Value: Sharing with Third Parties Without Consent
